mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.num AS "num", a.ordernumber AS "ordernumber", a.phone AS "phone", a.consignee AS "consignee", a.address AS "address", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.state AS "state", a.delivery_time AS "deliveryTime", a.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", a.express_name AS "expressName", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.freight AS "freight", a.favorable_price AS "favorablePrice", a.total_price AS "totalPrice", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.coupon_id AS "coupon.id", a.complete_time AS "completeTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u7.name AS "user.name", c.name as "coupon.name"
LEFT JOIN s_user u7 ON u7.id = a.user_id left join s_coupon c on c.id=a.coupon_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_order( id, num, ordernumber, phone, consignee, address, user_id, pay_time, order_time, state, delivery_time, invoice_no, express_name, goods_price, freight, favorable_price, total_price, pay_type, coupon_id, complete_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{num}, #{ordernumber}, #{phone}, #{consignee}, #{address}, #{user.id}, #{payTime}, #{orderTime}, #{state}, #{deliveryTime}, #{invoiceNo}, #{expressName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{freight}, #{favorablePrice}, #{totalPrice}, #{payType}, #{coupon.id}, #{completeTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_order SET num = #{num}, ordernumber = #{ordernumber}, phone = #{phone}, consignee = #{consignee}, address = #{address}, user_id = #{user.id}, pay_time = #{payTime}, order_time = #{orderTime}, state = #{state}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, express_name = #{expressName}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, freight = #{freight}, favorable_price = #{favorablePrice}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, pay_type = #{payType}, coupon_id = #{coupon.id}, complete_time = #{completeTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
